text:
Today, organizations need broad visibility across 
their IT environment to strengthen security.

However, your systems create logs and alerts in 
various formats stored in different locations.

It's time consuming and costly to aggregate 
and store data for security analysis at scale.

Amazon Security Lake helps you build a security 
datalake automatically collecting data from

pre-integrated cloud and on premises sources, 
including your custom log sources.

Amazon Security Lake supports 
the Open Cybersecurity Schema Framework,

a security industry open standard  
that reduces the complexity of transforming logs
To get started, select your data and log sources.

Then, choose which AWS regions to roll 
up your data.

Amazon Security Lake 
automatically starts collecting,

storing and managing your security data 
and its lifecycle.

Next, you can grant access to your data so
multiple security and analytics solutions
can ingest or query that data in place.

You no longer need to transfer  
and pre-process large volumes of data.

So, analysts can immediately support  
a variety of analytics use cases

across your accounts, workloads 
and applications.

Start improving your protection 
with Amazon Security Lake.
